title: FA Cup winners Crystal Palace looking for new motivation
description: Oliver Glasner would forgive his Crystal Palace players for being distracted following their FA Cup victory, but he believes they will not find motivation an issue versus Wolves on Tuesday. Palace lifted the first major trophy in their 120-year history on Saturday, as Eberechi Eze’s goal handed them a historic 1-0 FA Cup final win […] The post FA Cup winners Crystal Palace looking for new motivation appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Hurzeler urges Brighton to remain grounded after Liverpool turnaround
description: Fabian Hurzeler stressed Brighton have not achieved anything yet, after they twice came from behind to beat Liverpool 3-2 and strengthen their grip on eighth place.
